landing.header: All the paths you didn't go..
landing.headerAction: You can now explore them all!
landing.intro: 在 LearnGraph，我們相信每個人都應該走出屬於自己獨特的道路。我們正在打造一個互動且動態的知識地圖——一種類似於學習版 Google 地圖的工具——旨在幫助您探索一個充滿無限機會、根據您的熱情量身定制的世界。我們的平台正積極開發中，並由社群合作推動。加入我們在 Discord 上的 <linktodiscord>實踐社群</linktodiscord>，一起共創教育的未來！
landing.missionStatementText: 共同創造未來的教育——免費提供給每個人。 我們使人們能夠學習，無論他們的生活狀況如何，也無論可利用的資源有多少。 點此閱讀我們的白皮書.
landing.podcastAlternative: 喜歡聆聽嗎？試試我們的播客替代方案，與我們一起展開聲音之旅！

about.Storyp: After living in a Buddhist temple, Laurin came back with no agenda—just presence. He listened. One day, a friend said, “Wouldn’t it be cool if learning worked like Google Maps?” The idea sat in the space between them, waiting. Laurin picked it up. Soon, others joined. That’s how LearnGraph quietly began.
about.Our-Team-text: We’re not just building a platform—we’re living the practice.
about.team-Efecan: 教育策略與創新部門主管
about.quote-Laurin: The best ideas come from stillness. LearnGraph wasn’t built to disrupt — it was built to listen, to guide, and to grow with those who are ready to listen.
about.quote-Nama: 這個世界廣闊無垠，有些人擁有豐富資源，幫助那些資源匱乏的人是他們的責任。
about.quote-Efecan: Education is not about filling a vessel, but about kindling a flame - and I intend to set the whole system ablaze.
about.quote-Talal: 外面的世界雖充滿挑戰，但我們本不該孤單。重要的不在於我能為自己做什麼，而在於每個人能為全人類做什麼。
about.team-placeholder-description: We’re always looking for curious minds to join us. Whether you code, care about learning, or just have a wild idea—come say hi. <discord>Join our Discord</discord>, or send us a message to <email>jobs@learngraph.org</email>!
